data.comment: The match is underway at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Metz in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Metz capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 5, Metz take a 1-0 lead thanks to Farid Boulaya.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz are coming forward and Opa Nguette gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Denis Bouanga of Saint-Etienne gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Karim Abed signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Metz's half.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 11, Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Metz.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Metz.
In the minute 18, Metz have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 20, Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Metz!
Panagiotis Retsos (Saint-Etienne) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 24, Karim Abed awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 31, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz.
Victorien Angban (Metz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 32, Denis Bouanga (Saint-Etienne) gets a yellow card.
Metz needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Karim Abed signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Metz's area.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 41, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
Karim Abed signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Karim Abed has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Wahbi Khazri is replacing Kevin Monnet-Paquet for Saint-Etienne at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 48, Claude Puel is making the team's second substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Marvin Tshibuabua replacing Panagiotis Retsos.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 50, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
In the minute 52, Karim Abed signals a Metz throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Metz make their first substitution with Vagner replacing Lamine Gueye.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Metz.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Metz.
In the minute 60, Metz have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 61, Karim Abed awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Metz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
The away team replace Adil Aouchiche with Edmilson Indjai Correia.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Metz.
Saint-Etienne push upfield but Karim Abed quickly pulls them for offside.
Metz are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Metz.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Metz.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Marvin Tshibuabua (Saint-Etienne) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Farid Boulaya of Metz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 71, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yvan Neyou is booked for the away team.
Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Habib Maiga (Metz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 74, Saint-Etienne's Wahbi Khazri breaks free at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Metz have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Metz.
In the minute 77, Karim Abed awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
It's now 2-0 thanks to an own goal from Alpha Sissoko.
Karim Abed signals a Metz throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Metz.
Vincent Pajot for Metz has been booked by Karim Abed and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, The away team have replaced Yvan Neyou with Maxence Rivera. This is the fourth substitution made today by Claude Puel.
Tyron Tormin is on a sub for Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Karim Abed signals a Metz throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 89, Warren Tchimbembe is replacing Victorien Angban for the home team.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Metz.
At Stade Saint Symphorien the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Saint-Etienne drive upfield and Mahdi Camara gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Metz defender.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Metz make their third substitution with Mamadou Fofana replacing Habib Maiga.
